result.reason: Exporting passwords in cleartext via CSV is a security risk; users must be explicitly warned before proceeding.
result.approach: Modify FrmExport.cs to display a warning dialog when the user selects CSV export with the 'Include Password' option enabled, ensuring they understand the security implications.
